Package engine.fen

Class FenUtility

java.lang.Object
engine.fen.FenUtility
public class FenUtility extends Object
Handles the parsing of Forsyth-Edwards Notation strings, which are the standard supported format of board information for this engine.

  • Method Details

    • informationFromFen

      public static BoardInfo informationFromFen(String fenString)
      Creates a BoardInfo object from a FEN string.
      Parameters:
      fenString - the FEN string to convert to a BoardInfo object.
      Returns:
      a BoardInfo object if one could be generated. If an object could not be generated and could not be salvaged an exception will be thrown.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if fenString == null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the argument contains an incorrect number of components.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the board dimensions of the FEN string are invalid (exceed 8x8).
      IllegalArgumentException - if the player identifier is not "w" or "b".
      IllegalArgumentException - if the en passant tile identifier is not "-" and not two characters. If the en passant tile contains two characters but is not a valid tile on the board, the en passant tile returned by this object is assumed to be none.
      See Also:
      • BoardInfo

    • fenFromInformation

      public static String fenFromInformation(BoardInfo boardInfo)
      Creates a FEN String object from a BoardInfo object.
      Parameters:
      boardInfo - the BoardInfo object to convert to a FEN string.
      Returns:
      a String object.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if boardInfo == null.
